      • getGeometry

        public String getGeometry()
        Geometry in GML format used in the operation (not the feature's geometry)

      • getDistance

        public double getDistance()

      • getUnit

        public String getUnit()
        Can be a URI to use a measure unit from a dictionary Unit of measure. Recommended strings: "http://www.opengeospatial.org/sld/units/metre" "http://www.opengeospatial.org/sld/units/feet" "http://www.opengeospatial.org/sld/units/pixel" If null is returned, pixel will be used
        Returns:
